title: Adult Learner-Tailored English Learning Style Diagnostic Process

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher English communication skills and experience in mathematical problem-solving
context.additional_context: Designed to derive customized learning strategies tailored to the job characteristics of corporate managers/leaders, structured for short-duration focused learning in mobile environments.

learning_goals: Learners can complete an LSI-based survey within three days to generate their English learning style profile.
Learners can develop three or more personalized learning strategies based on diagnostic results.
Learners can identify their preferred learning style (visual/auditory/kinesthetic) in mathematical problem-solving with 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
